Reviews.Title: Cam works fine, Interferes with WIFI networks
Reviews.Author: rjeii2 "rjeii2"
Reviews.Content: The product works as it should. the only problem I had with this device is a major kicker. It completely shuts down any 2.4ghz wireless network (That's your standard WiFi frequency) its around. After messing around trying to figure it out I found the camera itself is the culprit (no issues w/the receiver.) Depending on your situation and intended I recommend buyers research more on this device before purchasing.

Reviews.Title: hmmmmmm
Reviews.Author: Brooke
Reviews.Content: I had alot of trouble getting this to work for me. I needed a great camera for home security,  I had a break in ). I thought that it would be nice to be able to hand the police a video of the people breaking into my apartment. However, have since settled for an IP cam instead.

ProductInfo.Features:
380TV lines clear picture display Tiny size for discreet observation & portability 4-channels available to avoid interference
The world¿s smallest pinhole wireless color camera Small enough to put up anywhere
Electronic shutter: 1/50-1/10,000 second. Transmission distance: 150-300 feet line of sight.
